templates.name: Copilot for Sales Voice Agent
templates.description: AI-powered sales assistant with voice capabilities, conversation memory management, and multi-agent orchestration for comprehensive sales support
templates.shortDescription: Voice-enabled sales agent with memory and multi-agent orchestration
features: Voice-enabled conversational interface with speech recognition and synthesis
Multi-agent orchestration for complex sales tasks
Persistent conversation memory with GUID-based user tracking
Integration with Dynamics 365 for CRM operations
Real-time Hacker News feed for market intelligence
Context-aware memory management for personalized interactions
Time machine feature for conversation replay and analysis

agents.name: HackerNewsAgent
agents.purpose: Fetches latest tech news for market insights

setup_steps: Create Azure Function App with Python runtime
Configure Azure OpenAI service and obtain API credentials
Set up Azure File Storage for conversation memory
Deploy function_app.py and agent files to Azure Functions
Configure environment variables in Function App settings
Deploy index_voice.html to static web hosting
Configure CORS settings for Function App
Obtain and configure Function key for authentication
customization_options: Modify agent behaviors by editing agent Python files
Customize UI appearance and voice settings in index_voice.html
Add new agents by creating files following BasicAgent pattern
Adjust memory retention and context handling in storage manager
Configure voice synthesis options and languages

userStories: As a sales representative, I want to update CRM records using voice commands while driving between meetings
As a sales manager, I want my team to access customer insights through natural conversation
As a field sales rep, I want to retrieve product information and pricing through voice queries
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy a voice-enabled AI assistant that allows sales teams to interact with CRM data, access market intelligence, and manage customer relationships through natural language conversations, with persistent memory for personalized interactions

customFields.name: voiceInterfaceDesign
customFields.label: Voice Interface Design
customFields.placeholder: Describe voice interaction patterns, wake words, and conversation flow

customFields.name: memoryRetentionPolicy
customFields.label: Memory Retention Policy
customFields.placeholder: Define how long conversations are retained and memory management rules

customFields.name: agentOrchestration
customFields.label: Multi-Agent Orchestration Strategy
customFields.placeholder: Describe how multiple agents work together for complex tasks

templates.name: Microsoft 365 Researcher Agent
templates.description: Out-of-the-box AI reasoning agent that performs deep research across enterprise data and web sources, employing a three-phase approach: Planning, Iterative Research, and Synthesis. Built on OpenAI's o3 deep research model with 88.5% higher accuracy than standard Copilot Chat.
templates.shortDescription: OOTB deep research agent with enterprise data integration
features: Deep research across internal and external sources
88.5% higher accuracy than standard Copilot Chat
Averages 10.1 sources per response with detailed citations
Clarifying question prompts for scope refinement
Professional report generation with actionable recommendations
Integration with emails, meetings, documents, and third-party apps

methodology.phase2: Iterative Research - Reason → Retrieve → Review cycles
methodology.phase3: Synthesis - Compiles findings into actionable reports

setup_steps: Ensure Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses are assigned
No additional setup required - works immediately
Optional: Configure Graph connectors for third-party data
Optional: Set up data governance policies
Train users on effective research queries
customization_options: Configure which data sources are accessible
Define data access policies by user group

performance.research_time_saved: 6-8 hours per week for product managers

userStories: As a product manager, I want to research market trends across internal data and external sources to make informed product decisions
As an executive, I want comprehensive research reports that synthesize information from emails, documents, and web sources
As a business analyst, I want to quickly gather insights from across our organization's knowledge base
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Leverage the pre-built Researcher agent to enable employees across the organization to perform deep, accurate research that combines internal organizational knowledge with external sources, saving 6-8 hours per week on research tasks

customFields.name: dataSourcePriorities
customFields.label: Data Source Priorities
customFields.placeholder: Define which internal and external sources should be prioritized for different types of research

customFields.name: researchGovernance
customFields.label: Research Governance Policies
customFields.placeholder: Outline data access policies, compliance requirements, and research boundaries

templates.name: Microsoft 365 Analyst Agent
templates.description: Out-of-the-box data analysis agent running on OpenAI's o3-mini model, executing Python code in real-time with visible code execution. Handles messy real-world data across Excel, CSV, JSON, PowerPoint, and PDF formats with automatic error recovery.
templates.shortDescription: OOTB data analyst with Python execution and multi-format support
features: Real-time Python code execution with visible output
Multi-format data handling (Excel, CSV, JSON, PowerPoint, PDF)
Automatic error recovery and data cleaning

skills: Basic understanding of data analysis concepts

setup_steps: Ensure Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses are assigned
No additional setup required - works immediately
Prepare data files in supported formats
Train users on effective analysis queries
customization_options: Integrate with Power BI for advanced visualizations

userStories: As a business analyst, I want to analyze sales data across multiple Excel files to identify trends and patterns
As a finance manager, I want to create revenue projections from historical data with visible calculation methods
As a marketing director, I want to analyze customer behavior patterns from CSV exports without manual data cleaning
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Leverage the pre-built Analyst agent to democratize data analysis across the organization, enabling any employee to perform sophisticated analyses on messy real-world data without coding skills

customFields.name: analysisTemplates
customFields.label: Standard Analysis Templates
customFields.placeholder: Define reusable analysis patterns for common business questions

customFields.name: dataQualityStandards
customFields.label: Data Quality Standards
customFields.placeholder: Specify data validation rules and quality thresholds

templates.name: Dynamics 365 Sales Research Agent
templates.description: Microsoft's most sophisticated sales intelligence offering, available through the AI Accelerator for Sales program. Transforms natural language queries into comprehensive business intelligence through deep research capabilities with AI Cursor technology and multibranch research journeys.
templates.shortDescription: Advanced sales intelligence with AI-driven research and insights
features: AI Cursor technology for context-aware interactions
Multibranch research journeys for complex analysis
Natural language to business intelligence transformation
Integration with Dynamics 365 and external data sources
Excel and PDF file analysis capabilities

systems: AI Accelerator for Sales program enrollment

ai_features.cursor_technology: Context-aware interaction anywhere on research canvas

deployment_phases.foundation: Months 1-2: Environment setup and data preparation

setup_steps: Enroll in AI Accelerator for Sales program
Set up security roles and permissions
customization_options: Configure research focus areas by role

userStories: As a sales manager, I want to analyze territory performance and identify growth opportunities through AI-driven insights
As an account executive, I want to research prospect companies and understand their business challenges before meetings
As a sales operations leader, I want to forecast revenue with AI-powered analysis of pipeline and historical data
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Transform sales operations through AI-driven research capabilities that provide deep customer insights, market intelligence, and predictive analytics, enabling data-driven decision making at scale

templates.name: Email Intelligence Agent
templates.description: Automatically categorizes, prioritizes, and routes emails using AI to improve response times and customer satisfaction. Includes sentiment analysis and smart routing capabilities.
templates.shortDescription: Smart email categorization and routing with AI
features: Priority detection based on content and sender

systems: Exchange Online or compatible email system

ai_model_settings: Training data requirements (min 50 examples per category)

setup_steps: Prepare historical email data for training
Build Power Automate flow for email processing
customization_options: Add custom categories specific to business

userStories: As a customer service manager, I want emails automatically categorized so agents focus on high-priority issues
As a customer, I want my urgent emails routed quickly to the right department
As an agent, I want to see email sentiment and suggested responses to handle cases efficiently
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement AI-driven email processing to automatically categorize, prioritize, and route customer emails, reducing response times by 65% and improving customer satisfaction through intelligent automation

customFields.name: emailCategories
customFields.label: Email Category Definitions
customFields.placeholder: Define email categories and classification rules (e.g., Billing, Technical Support, Sales Inquiry)

customFields.name: routingMatrix

customFields.placeholder: Map categories to departments and define escalation paths

customFields.name: priorityRules

templates.name: Document Intelligence Agent
templates.description: Extract and process information from documents using AI, reducing manual data entry and improving accuracy. Handles forms, invoices, contracts, and unstructured documents.
templates.shortDescription: AI-powered document data extraction and processing

model_training: Custom model creation for each document type

setup_steps: Set up Azure Form Recognizer resource
Create custom models for each document type
Set up error handling and monitoring
Deploy pilot with subset of documents

userStories: As a finance clerk, I want invoice data automatically extracted so I can process payments faster
As a compliance officer, I want contracts analyzed for key clauses to ensure regulatory compliance
As an operations manager, I want document processing automated to reduce errors and costs
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement end-to-end document processing automation using AI to extract data from various document types, validate against business rules, and integrate with downstream systems, reducing processing time by 90%
